entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Outlook
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:33 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Outlook 5:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -17.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -30
Dewpoint: -20.6°C
Wind: SE 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Blowing snow at times overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Blowing snow at times in the morning. Amount 10 cm. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
